PODCAST QUOTE GENERATOR Call us Menu Sunset 17 Bookings: 949-391-2312 Home / About Podcasting for business About Sunset 17 Sunset 17 Studio is located in beautiful Costa Mesa, California. We have everything you could possibly need to solve your content problem under one roof. Sunset 17 can create a responsive and integrated content campaign to accelerate your business growth and add value to your brand. Contact us to get started today. Sunset 17’s Story Sunset 17 TV & Podcast Studio was founded by Jason Lavin and Murphy Karges to enable businesses and individuals to share their inspiring stories in a high-quality, engaging format. They are extremely experienced in all aspects of content creation for businesses, from the pre-production consultation to the complete distribution and marketing of the content. What is my Content Problem? Businesses worldwide are currently experiencing a serious content problem. Consumers are expecting fresh, high-quality & consistent content from the businesses they patronize, and very few companies are satisfying these demands. Sunset 17 Studio is the solution to this content problem – we help businesses produce engaging content and strategically guide them on how to get that content to their patrons in the right way. You can book sessions up to 24 hours in advance. What is Sunset 17’s cancellation policy? Please contact Sunset 17 as soon as possible if you need to cancel your studio session. We can accommodate cancellations with 48 hours’ notice. Can I bring my own equipment to use in the studio? We generally don’t prefer people to bring outside equipment, like replacement microphones. If you are interested in a production that requires additional equipment, please give us a call to discuss options. Without prior permission, connecting, disconnecting, or moving any equipment is strictly prohibited. What is Sunset 17’s rescheduling policy? Please contact Sunset 17 as soon as possible if you need to reschedule your studio session. If you need to reschedule or cancel within a few hours of your session, we charge a $20 reschedule fee to pay the engineer for their time. Is food or drink allowed in the studio? No food or drink is allowed inside the studios except for water in a resealable bottle. Is there parking at Sunset 17 Studio? Sunset 17 Studio is attached to a large parking lot that generally has plenty of available parking spaces. PODCAST QUOTE GENERATOR Call us Menu Sunset 17 Bookings: 949-391-2312 Home / Services / Website & Podcast Integration Content Creation For Business Website & Podcast Integration The most important distribution channel for your podcast is your website. Business gets done on a website. That’s why it’s crucial to ensure your podcast lives on and is promoted through your website first, and then shared across other platforms. While platforms like YouTube, Instagram, and LinkedIn are great for exposure, they aren’t where business transactions happen. Your website is where the real connections are made and value is created. Get Started Website development Our team has years of experience building new websites that take full advantage of podcast content. Whether you are using the content to educate your customers, sell educational content, or support your e-commerce store, we can help. Some of our favorite platforms include Shopify, WordPress, and Kajabi but build on other platforms as well depending on your needs. Podcast Integration Our in-house design and development team are experts at integrating podcasts into existing websites. We’ll make sure that the new content aligns with your brand’s look and feel, is organized into the navigation, and is optimized for search engine optimization (SEO). Frequently Asked Questions What is the benefit of adding podcasts to my site vs posting on social media? When you post your podcast clips on social media we recommend linking to your website where the full episode lives. Once they visit your website you are much more likely to build a relationship with the visitor and eventually sell them your product or service. Can I automatically update new podcast episodes on my website? It depends on what you want the user experience to be like. It is possible to use an RSS feed integration to automatically display and update new episodes on your website without manually adding each one. Can I customize the look and feel of the podcast player? We suggest using Youtube embedded videos for your podcast and short clips. This means you do not have to host the videos yourself and you can cross promote your Youtube channel as well. How long does it take to integrate my podcast into my website? The timeline can vary depending on your website’s setup and any custom features you need. This website uses cookies to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage and assist in our marketing efforts. https://www.sunset17.com/privacy-policy/: Orange County, CA Podcast & TV Studio | Sunset 17 Studio Skip to content Looking for a quote? PODCAST QUOTE GENERATOR Call us Menu Sunset 17 Bookings: 949-391-2312 Home / Privacy Policy Privacy Policy Who we are Our website address is: https://www.sunset17.com. Comments When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection. An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment. Media If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website. Cookies If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year. If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser. When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select “Remember Me”, your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed. If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day. Embedded content from other websites Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website. These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website. Who we share your data with If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email. How long we retain your data If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue. For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information. What rights you have over your data If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes. Where we send your data Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service. This website uses cookies to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage and assist in our marketing efforts. By continuing to use this site, you accept our use of cookies and privacy policy. PODCAST QUOTE GENERATOR Call us Menu Sunset 17 Bookings: 949-391-2312 Home / Pricing / Podcast & TV Pricing / Podcast Distribution Set Up vs Maintenance PODCAST DISTRIBUTION There are two ways to look at podcast distribution. There is a set up, and then there is maintenance. First – the set up (only once) has to happen (and this is a one-time charge) Second – The ongoing maintenance of uploading the podcasts as the schedule dictates. Set up is a $990 charge (one-time) and involves consulting, artwork, account creation, meta data.
